mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, STATE, CREATE_PERSION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ROLE_RESOURCE (ROLE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, STATE, CREATE_PERSION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into SYS_ROLE_RESOURCE (ROLE_ID, RESOURCE_ID)
select #{item.roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} from dual

insert into SYS_ROLE_RESOURCE
ROLE_ID,
RESOURCE_ID,
STATE,
CREATE_PERSION,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_PERSON,
UPDATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update SYS_ROLE_RESOURCE
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_PERSION = #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
